Html:
Hi,

     I'm using the Compound FDP layout but I can't figure out whether it is possible to set some fixed nodes.

"Fixed" means exactly that: the algorythm should not move them at all. In particular I'm trying to set fixed positions for compound nodes while their children can move freely.

I've tried to set the IsFixedToParent property to true of the VertexData class but still the ApplyForce method moves those fixed nodes.

Am I doing something wrong?

Thanks in advance, pirobox
